institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 17 (Detailed standards for support of joint training centers, etc.)
contents: Article 17 (Detailed standards for support for joint training centers, etc.) ① Detailed standards for support under Article 11 (2) of the Regulations and training cost support under Article 21 are listed in Appendix 1, “Support for Joint Training Centers, etc.” In accordance with the detailed standards for. ② The joint training center, etc., submits Form 4 of the Business Manual with the contracting company, “National Human Resources Development Consortium Agreement,” and the deduction of the maximum amount of vocational competency development-related expenses that the contracting company can receive annual support for the year in which the contracting company wishes to receive training cost support. You must sign an agreement and register it with HRD-Net. Revised 2022. 6. 28.
